name: Blazing Fury Demo
description:
*** V0.2 ***

Beat Them Up Project for the final 2 weeks of 3WA development course.

All graphics and animations done by myself.

Just one level for the moment but stay tuned for more !

Keyboard : ZQSD / WASD for movement, double tap to Dash, K to Attack, L to Jump Esc To Pause the game.

Gamepad : X to Attack, A to Jump, Start to Pause the game.

Please comment and share if you liked the game ! Even if you didn't ;)
